item.title: Jamuary 2023
item.description: Some lessons learned from my studio jams during Jamuary 2023. Use a DAW template! Setup the mixer and audio interface to work generically enough with the outboard gear you want to use. Record stems and a mixer “main” if you can. If the main mix is good enough great, job done. If not you have stems to “remix” the main performance. Levels are easier to correct with less noise, in the digital domain.
